annotations.label: Page-header
annotations.text: ΕΝ
annotations.translation: 英语

annotations.label: Page-header
annotations.text: Official Journal of the European Communities
annotations.translation: 欧洲共同体官方公报

annotations.label: Page-header
annotations.translation: 98 年 5 月 8 日

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: B. Size tolerances
annotations.translation: B. 尺寸公差

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: For all classes: 10 % by number of cauliflowers not satisfying the requirements as regards sizing and the size indicated but conforming to the size immediately below and/or that stated on the package, the minimum diameter for heads in the smallest size grade being 10 cm.
annotations.translation: 对于所有等级：按数量计算，10% 的花椰菜不符合尺寸和所示尺寸的要求，但符合下方和/或包装上注明的尺寸，最小尺寸级别的花椰菜头的最小直径为 10 厘米。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: V. PROVISIONS CONCERNING PRESENTATION
annotations.translation: 五、关于呈现形式的规定

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: A. Uniformity
annotations.translation: A. 均匀性

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: The contents of each package must be uniform and contain only cauliflowers of the same origin, commercial type, quality and size. In addition, each package of 'Extra' Class cauliflowers must also be uniformly made up as to colour.
annotations.translation: 每个包装的内容物必须一致，并且只装有产地、商品类型、质量和大小相同的花椰菜。另外，每包“特”级花椰菜的颜色也必须统一。

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: The visible part of the contents of the package must be representative of the entire contents.
annotations.translation: 包装内容物的可见部分必须代表全部内容物。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: B. Packaging
annotations.translation: B. 包装

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: Cauliflowers must be packed in such a way so as to protect the produce properly.
annotations.translation: 花椰菜必须以适当的方式包装，以保护产品。

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: The materials used inside the package must be new, clean and of a quality such as to avoid causing any external or internal damage to the produce. The use of materials, particularly of paper or stamps, bearing trade specifications is allowed provided the printing or labelling has been done with non-toxic ink or glue.
annotations.translation: 包装内使用的材料必须是新的、干净的，并且质量优良，以避免对产品造成任何外部或内部损坏。允许使用带有贸易规格的材料，特别是纸张或印章，前提是印刷或标签采用的是无毒墨水或胶水。

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: Packages must be free of all foreign matter.
annotations.translation: 包装内不得有任何异物。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: C. Presentation
annotations.translation: C. 呈现形式

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: Cauliflowers may be presented:
annotations.translation: 花椰菜可以是下列呈现形式：

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (i) with leaves: cauliflowers covered with healthy green leaves, sufficient in number and long enough to cover and protect the head entirely. The stalk must be cut off slightly below the protecting leaves;
annotations.translation: (i) 带叶：花椰菜上覆盖着健康的绿叶，数量足够多，长度足够覆盖和保护整个头部。茎秆须在保护叶稍下方的位置切断；

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (ii) without leaves: cauliflowers with all the leaves and the non-edible portion of the stalk removed. At most, there may be five small and tender pale green leaves, untrimmed, close to the head;
annotations.translation: (ii) 不带叶：去掉所有叶片和茎秆非食用部分的花椰菜，最多只可能有五片淡绿色的小嫩叶，未修剪，靠近头部；

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (iii) trimmed: cauliflowers with a sufficient number of leaves left on to protect the head. These leaves must be healthy and green and trimmed to not more than 3 cm from the top of the head. The stem must be cut off slightly below the protecting leaves.
annotations.translation: (iii) 修剪过：花椰菜留有足够数量的叶片以保护头部。这些叶片必须是健康的绿叶，并修剪至距头部顶端不超过 3 厘米。茎秆必须在保护叶稍下方的位置切断。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: VI . PROVISIONS CONCERNING MARKING
annotations.translation: 六、有关标记的规定

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: Each package must bear the following particulars, in letters grouped on the same side, legibly and in delibly marked, and visible from the outside:
annotations.translation: 每个包装必须在同一侧用字母分组标明以下信息，标记清晰可见，不可擦除，且从外部可见：

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: A. Identification
annotations.translation: A. 识别

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: Packer and/or Dispatcher: Name and address or officially issued or accepted code mark. However, in the case where a code mark is used, the reference' packer and/or dispatcher (or equivalent abbreviations)' has to be indicated in close connection with the code mark.
annotations.translation: 包装商和/或发货商：名称和地址或官方发布或认可的代码标记。 但是，在使用代码标记的情况下，“包装商和/或发货商（或等效缩写）”必须与代码标记紧密相连。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: B. Nature of produce
annotations.translation: B. 农产品的性质

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: 'Cauliflowers', if the contents are not visible from the outside
annotations.translation: “花椰菜”，如果从外部看不见内容物

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: Name of the commercial type for violet/purple or green cauliflowers
annotations.translation: 紫罗兰色/紫色或绿色花椰菜的商业类型名称

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: C. Origin of produce
annotations.translation: C. 农产品原产地

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: Country of origin and, optionally, district where grown, or national, regional or local place name.
annotations.translation: 原产国以及可选填种植地区或国家名称/地区名称/当地地名。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: D. Commercial specifications
annotations.translation: D. 商业规格

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: Class
annotations.translation: 等级

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: Size expressed in minimum and maximum diameters or number of units
annotations.translation: 尺寸以最小和最大直径或单位数表示

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: E. Official control mark (optional)
annotations.translation: E. 官方控制标志（可选）
